origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.analyze_company', 'description': 'This function analyzes a company's financial health by retrieving and analyzing its financial reports, comparing with industry peers, and obtaining credit ratings and bond information.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company to be analyzed.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years of financial data to consider.'}, {'name': 'financialReports', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include financial reports in the analysis.'}, {'name': 'industryComparison', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to compare with industry peers.'}, {'name': 'creditRating', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include credit ratings in the analysis.'}, {'name': 'bondInfo', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include recent bond issuance information.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisResult', 'description': 'The detailed financial analysis of the company.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.analyze_company, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyName'是'TechCorp', 'years'是'5', 'financialReports'是'true', 'industryComparison'是'true', 'creditRating'是'true', 'bondInfo'是'true'.
